FuncDef:
The speed command configures the operating speed of the current POS interface.
The undo speed command restores the default value.
By default, the interface rate of a CR5D00P8UF70 subcard is 2.5Gbit/s. The interface rate of the CR53-P10-8xPOS/STM4-SFP, CR53-P10-4xPOS/STM1-SFP, CR53-P10-4xPOS/STM4-SFP subcard is 622Mbit/s.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the speed is 155 Mbit/s.
155 Mbit/s is the operating speed of synchronous transmission mode (STM-1) in SDH system.
-

Indicates that the speed is 622 Mbit/s. 622 Mbit/s is the operating speed of advanced synchronous transmission mode (STM-4) in SDH system.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In networking application scenario, the speed of local interface should be the consistent with the remote interface to ensure the matched operating speed in both end of a link, which can solve the problem that POS interface in both end of a link transfer packets with low speed.
Precautions
Only the CR5D00P8UF70, CR53-P10-8xPOS/STM4-SFP, CR53-P10-4xPOS/STM1-SFP, CR53-P10-4xPOS/STM4-SFP subcard supports this command.
The configuration must be cleared in POS interface before changing its operating speed;To ensure the speed change configuration take effect, the POS interface must be shut down first, execute the command in second, and open the inteface in last.
Only the CR5D00P8UF70subcard supports the parameter 622.
